settings.text: Sign up for exclusive deals and early access to new products.
Anonymous Copenhagen, now a Certified B Corporation

Anonymous Copenhagen is proud to announce a significant milestone in our journey towards ethical and sustainable fashion footwear and accessories. We have officially become a certified B Corporation, making us the first fashion footwear brand in Scandinavia to achieve such prestigious recognition.
Anonymous Copenhagen’s B Corporation certification is not merely a landmark achievement for us; it represents a crucial step in our ongoing journey towards responsible and sustainable fashion. This certification underscores our dedication to ethical business practices and environmental stewardship. But becoming certified is not the end of the journey; rather, it’s an important step that reinforces our commitment to continuous improvement and innovation. Together, we look forward to forging a future where these principles are at the core of everything we do, leading the way in creating a more responsible and sustainable industry.

Our B Corporation certification is more than just a milestone; it’s a statement of intent. It signifies our aspiration for an inclusive and sustainable industry and a future that reflects the values of our partners and customers.

We extend our heartfelt gratitude to all those who have supported us on this journey. Together, we are forging a new path for ethical and sustainable footwear, creating a legacy that transcends fashion and resonates with the aspirations of modern consumers.
